content: गिरि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गॄ-इ किच्च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 142</ls>] Venerable, respectable, worshipful. --रिः {@--1@} A hill, mountain, an elevation; पश्याधःखनने मूढ गिग्यो न पतंति किं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; ननु प्रवातेऽपि निष्कंपा गिरयः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--2@} A huge rock. {@--3@} A disease of the eyes. {@--4@} An honorific title given to Saṃnyāsins; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} आनंदगिरिः {@--5@} (In math.) The number ‘eight’. {@--6@} A ball with which children play (गेंदुक). {@--7@} A cloud. {@--8@} A peculiar defect in quicksilver. --रिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Swallowing. {@--2@} A rat; mouse (written also गिरी in this sense).
